version_description:
Change from paid download to in-app purchase mode;
Improve color scheme.

Change from paid download to in-app purchase mode;
Improve color scheme.

Improve Human interface.
Remove Absolute function abs(), add Standard Deviation function σ().

Improve Human interface.
Remove Absolute function abs(), add Standard Deviation function σ().

Add percentage operation as well as a switch that set it on or off;
Improve some other features.

Add percentage operation as well as a switch that set it on or off;
Improve some other features.
Add supports for Europe & India numeral systems.
Add supports for Europe & India numeral systems.
Add user guidance and some other improvements.
Add user guidance and some other improvements.
Bug fixed and an IAP item added for remove ads only.
Bug fixed and an IAP item added for remove ads only.

* You can easily edit mathematical expression in the large input area, save history records and use them again.
* You can copy the entire expression to clipboard, for example:
1000×23.5+9.2×6.1+333÷√(9) = 23,667.12
* You can choose beautiful color appearance, and even use your favorite picture as wallpaper.

* You can easily edit mathematical expression in the large input area, save history records and use them again.
* You can copy the entire expression to clipboard, for example:
1000×23.5+9.2×6.1+333÷√(9) = 23,667.12
* You can choose beautiful color appearance, and even use your favorite picture as wallpaper.

* 您可以在超大的输入区轻松编辑数学表达式，可以保存历史记录并再次使用。
* 您可以复制整个表达式到剪贴板，例如：
1000×23.5+9.2×6.1+333÷√(9) = 23,667.12 。
* 您可以选择漂亮的色彩外观，甚至可以将自己喜欢的图片用作墙纸。
